sentences.english: Ensures and is accountable for adherence to applicable wage and hour laws for non-exempt and minor store partners.
sentences.chinese: 確保並負責對所有店員應用相關的工資及工時政策。

sentences.english: The whole suit took 600 man hours to make. (Click on the above link to see the bejeweled suit.)
Liu said he and his family will also receive two apartments when the construction is finished.
sentences.chinese: 劉說，他和家人還將在建築完工時得到兩套公寓。

sentences.english: As for glass wool insulation layer, the construction workers will create fiber body itching.
sentences.chinese: 如保溫層爲玻璃棉，施工時纖維會造成工人身體痕癢。

sentences.english: Wear rubber or latex gloves when using.
sentences.chinese: 施工時請使用橡膠或乳膠手套。

sentences.english: The Accident Intensity is expressed as the lost man-hours per 1,000 man-hours.
sentences.chinese: 事故強度表示每十萬工時中因傷害事故而損失的工時。

sentences.english: The Accident Intensity is expressed as the lost man-hours per 1,000 man-hours.
sentences.chinese: 事故強度表示每十萬工時中因傷害事故而損失的工時。

sentences.english: Dual CPU integrating programming and control, programming is available when machining.
sentences.chinese: 雙CPU結構編程控制一體化，加工時可以同機編程。

sentences.english: The design team was able to dispense with the time-consuming steps of welding on the seat and back rest.
sentences.chinese: 設計團隊省略生產時焊接研磨的繁瑣步驟與工時。

sentences.english: She met Uncle Dalton when she was working as a deaner at the bus station.
sentences.chinese: 她是在公共汽車站作清潔工時遇到多爾頓舅舅的。

sentences.english: Employers pay the highest hourly rate to people with experience in networking technologies.
sentences.chinese: 僱主支付擁有網絡工程師的僱員的工時費最高。

sentences.english: The oil workers have chucked down their tools again, demanding shouter hours and higher pay.
sentences.chinese: 石油工人又罷工了，要求縮短工時增加工資。

sentences.english: Worker skill levels, progressive, non-working hours waiting for the time machine.
sentences.chinese: 工人技能水平向上，工時不含機器等待時間。

sentences.english: Many American business firms consult graphologists for advice about which people to hire.
sentences.chinese: 美國有些公司在僱傭員工時也要徵求筆體學家的意見。

sentences.english: No longer needs the ceramic tile 45 degrees cutting edges, saved man-hour and the breakage greatly.
sentences.chinese: 不再需要瓷磚45度切邊，大大節約了工時和破損。

sentences.english: Though it took about 1000 hours of staff time, the changeover was well received.
sentences.chinese: 這個改變花費了1000個工時，但也頗受到好評。

definition: kind of work in production (e.g. benchwork, foundry work etc)
employee/person employed in a trade or profession
expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
public/publicly (owned, financed, operated etc)/run by the state
